# About Luganodes

Luganodes is a AAA rated institutional-grade staking service provider and one
of the top leaders in staking volume. Globally, Luganodes’s client base stakes
digital assets across 46\+ PoS live networks with 99.99% uptime. It is one of
the top validator on the Polygon network and the super representative on the
Tron network.

With Luganodes, enterprises and individuals can take part in validating
blockchain transactions and earning staking rewards. We embark on our
sophisticated services for corporate clients and individual stakers.
